vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_2.sol#15-19) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(calculatedFibNumber * 1000000000000000000) (patch_2.sol#18)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_2.sol#15-19) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) (patch_2.sol#17)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.fallback (patch_2.sol#21-23) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) (patch_2.sol#22)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber (patch_2.sol#5) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- withdraw (patch_2.sol#15-19)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber should be constant (patch_2.sol#5)
FibonacciBalance.start should be constant (patch_2.sol#6)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function setFibonacci(uint n) public {
        calculatedFibNumber = fibonacci(n);

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_2.sol#15-19):
	-require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) patch_2.sol#17

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.fallback (patch_2.sol#21-23):
	-require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) patch_2.sol#22

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_fibonacciLibrary' of FibonacciBalance. (patch_2.sol#11) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_start' of FibonacciLib.setStart (patch_2.sol#30) is not in mixedCase
